main event: On October 15, 1966, a civilian observed an unidentified flying object in Hazlet, New Jersey around 1:00 PM.
interesting points: The object was described as round and about the size of a quarter held at arm's length., The object emitted a bright white light and was seen hovering quietly., Witnesses reported it moved very slowly and then accelerated quickly, disappearing into the sky., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., There were no visible means of propulsion or sound associated with the object.
